sql-case.value: COMMENT ON AUDIT POLICY read_dir_pol IS 'this is a default policy'
COMMENT ON COLUMN employees.job_id IS 'abbreviated job title'
COMMENT ON EDITION editionName IS 'some comments'
COMMENT ON INDEXTYPE indtype IS 'some comments'
COMMENT ON MATERIALIZED VIEW viewName IS 'some comments'
COMMENT ON MINING MODEL modelName IS 'some comments'
COMMENT ON OPERATOR op IS 'some comments'
COMMENT ON TABLE employees IS 'some comments'
comment on constraint test_id_name_key on test is 'child';
comment on domain test is 'About to drop this..';
comment on event trigger test_trigger is 'test';
comment on index at_partitioned_0_id_name_key is 'child';
COMMENT ON ACCESS METHOD gin IS 'GIN index access method';
COMMENT ON AGGREGATE my_aggregate (double precision) IS 'Computes sample variance';
COMMENT ON CAST (text AS int4) IS 'Allow casts from text to int4';
COMMENT ON POLICY my_policy ON table1 IS 'Filter rows by users';
COMMENT ON RULE my_rule ON table1 IS 'Logs updates of employee records';
COMMENT ON TRIGGER my_trigger ON table1 IS 'Used for RI';
COMMENT ON OPERATOR ^ (text, text) IS 'Performs intersection of two texts';
COMMENT ON OPERATOR CLASS int4ops USING btree IS '4 byte integer operators for btrees';
COMMENT ON OPERATOR FAMILY integer_ops USING btree IS 'all integer operators for btrees';
COMMENT ON ROUTINE my_routine (integer, integer) IS 'Runs a routine (which is a function or procedure)';
COMMENT ON PROCEDURE my_proc (integer, integer) IS 'Runs a report';
COMMENT ON TABLESPACE my_tablespace IS 'Tablespace for indexes';
COMMENT ON TEXT SEARCH TEMPLATE snowball IS 'Snowball stemmer';
COMMENT ON TABLE t_order IS 'order table'
COMMENT ON COLUMN t_order.status IS 'status column'
